title: Haunted
summary: Ultra realistic old CRT watch face with scary effects.
description: Don't stare at it too long or this watch face might terrify you! This watch face has to be seen in action. Pictures don't do it justice.If you don't want to be scared there's also a plain version:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.marcovhv.crt
descriptionHTML:
Don't stare at it too long or this watch face might terrify you! This watch face has to be seen in action. Pictures don't do it justice.

If you don't want to be scared there's also a plain version:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.marcovhv.crt
comments: Original Well thought of. Scared me a little bit lol.
Great watch face Love the way it looks on my Moto 360
Great looking watch face. Love the simple design.  Would be fun to turn off the scary face or change the frequency and/or duration of the face. Nice work on this.
